summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Neighborhoods; accepting the proposal of Pacific Domains, Inc. to purchase and develop property located at the northeast corner of 12th Avenue and East Jefferson Street in the 12th Avenue Development Area of the City of Seattle; authorizing execution of a contract for sale of the property, conveyance of the property by quit claim deed, execution of closing documents, and administration of the transaction; and designating the disposition of sale proceeds.
